name: ORGANICASEO
tag_list: internet-marketing, internet-promotion, web-marketing, web-promotion, indianapolis-social-media-marketing, indianapolis-smm, indianapolis-seo-company, indianapolis-smo
overview:
The Organica team is a leading provider of Social Media Marketing (SMM), Social Media Optimization (SMO), Internet Marketing, and Branding. The services we offer are in Managed Campaign Services and the Self-Service Organica SaaS application.

We are a specialized force of software developers and engineers who have been working with the Organica Application since its inception. The team of 25 specialists knows the product and its functionality inside and out. We are constantly developing the Organica application to increase its functionality, ease of use, and intelligence.

Our top priority is to help your business grow and thrive. As a customer, your needs come first. Anyway our Organica team can improve our product to fit your needs, we want to know about. The Organica team is friendly and easy to work with. We are always willing to take questions or suggestions about your experience with us or our Organica product. Organica is a management system for Social Media Marketing (SMM) and Optimization (SMO). Its purpose is to collect, harvest, query, and calculate data available across the Internet for the promotion of your business. Organica is a marketing tool designed specifically for website promotion. Its main tactic is the creation of rich content and its proper distribution across writable web resources and social media platforms.
